text: [PH] Shooting many smaller projectiles instead of one large one is more effective when fighting multiple small targets, such as infantry units.
[PH] This is the standard shot type for this unit.
[PH] Does more damage than Standard Round, but is less accurate. Most effective against infantry.
[PH] Does more damage, but is less accurate and slower. Can cause buildings to catch fire.
[PH] Reduces enemy's melee attack and defence & causes fatigue. Also reduces firing range.
[PH] Causes less damage, but has a fearsome sound. Adversely affects the morale, melee attack & firing rate of targets & any unit they pass over.

[PH] Has greater range but causes less damage.
